text:
Megyn Marie Kelly (born November 18, 1970; previously called Megyn Kendall) is an American reporter on Fox News and NBC. She hosted "The Kelly File". She previously hosted "America Live" on Fox News and "Megyn Kelly Today" on NBC. She also hosts the channel's New Year's Eve Special Live every December 31.
Criticism.
On October 26, 2018, NBC News announced the cancellation of "Megyn Kelly Today" in the wake of defending blackface as Halloween costumes.
Kelly was born in Syracuse, New York.
